memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is dead. This is very concerning. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share any suspicions you have."
Diana: "Everyone, I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town!"
You: "I am not the mafioso! Diana's accusation seems suspicious. Why would she investigate me specifically? Maybe she's trying to frame me as the mafioso to save herself."

Charlie: "Diana claims Bob is the mafia, but she's the only one who can investigate. If she's lying, she's trying to get us to vote out an innocent. Bob's point about her framing him is valid. We need more information before we..."
Diana: "I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. His accusation against me is just deflection. Charlie, we must vote him out now to protect the town!"
You: "Charlie, I think you're right. We need more than Diana's word. She might be trying to mislead us to protect herself."
